1: <pb/><e>A jun tic sb'it David yic 'ix 'at 'elc 'a jun yunnal tzcuch Absalón</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, til wal tz'aj sniwtj sb'isl eb' tzchichn 'och 'ayin, yet' pax eb' tzmeltzj 'och 'ajc'ojlal 'ayin.</t>
2: <t>Til wal eb' tzaln 'ixtc 'a in patic: A Dios ma'oj colwjoc yet'oc, xchi eb'.</t>
3: <t>Palta wojtac to in Colmal aji, ach tzin ej cha'an̈, tza'n in te'nal.</t>
4: <pb/><t>A yic tzin 'awj 'aych Mamin Jehová, tzach ta'w cot 'ayn 'a jun tzaln to ecn̈ej yaji.</t>
5: <t>Tzq'uic'b'i, tzin 'e'x can c'otn in wayi, ax yic tzsacb' pax 'eli tz'elx in wayn̈ 'a tzaljc'ojlal. Tzin q'uex wa'an yujto ach tzin a tan̈wej.</t>
6: <t>Wach'xam caw niwn eb' soldado tz'och oyn 'ayin, tznib'j eb' yac' owl wet'oc, palta matz in xiw yuj eb'.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová cotn̈ colwjoc wet'oc, coln ach in Diosal. Ach 'oj a ma'lajwc sat eb' 'ajc'ojl yajch 'ayin, ax a ma'n pax 'el ye eb' tzb'on maysch'olnil 'a in patic.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Caw wal colwjum ach, 'ac' a yaxilal 'a quib'n̈ an̈ a chon̈b' on̈ tic on̈.</t>
